Html:
I am having an issue where Rawr keeps suggesting as the best gemming for various items gems that have hit on them, despite the fact that I am already hit capped. When I attempt to "Add Custom Gemming...", the only options I am given are Dragonseye gems, for some reason. I am attempting to place an Inscribed Monarch Topaz in my helm where it keeps attempting to stick an Etched Monarch Topaz (for no discernable reason). Am I doing something wrong or is this some kind of bug?

Thanks.
Sounds like you have most gems filtered out, perhaps? Reenable everything in the Filters dropdown in the top right.

Ah, looks like that was it. I didn't realize the "Crafted" filter would filter gems as well as armor.

Thanks!
